name: Pattern Recognition
book: Pathfinder Companion: Second Darkness Player's Guide. Copyright 2008, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text:
Pattern recognition allows you to notice unusual breaks in the patterns of stones in a wall, boards in a ﬂoor, cracks in glass, trees in a forest, or similar interruptions. You gain an insight bonus equal to one-half your caster level (minimum +1, maximum +10) on Perception checks.

You gain the same bonus on Survival checks made to follow tracks. Pattern recognition does not grant you the Track feat, a rogue's trapﬁnding ability, or the ability to disable traps. You can use it in conjunction with those abilities if you possess them, though.
text_zh: 模式识别能令你注意到墙在上石制图案、地面木板上不寻常的裂缝，玻璃的裂缝、森林中的树，或类似的破绽处。你在搜索(Search)检定上获得等同于你施法者等级的一半(最小为+1，最大为+10)的内在加值。 你也在生存检定中用来追寻踪迹上获得相同加值。 模式识别并不会让你获得追踪(Track)专长、盗贼的寻找陷阱职业能力、或解除陷阱的能力。但如果你拥有那些能力，你可以结合使用。 译注：Second darkness 此时依然使用3R的规则，所以搜索(Search)技能已经与另外两个，合并为察觉技能、追踪专长则已经取消。
